titles.title: A bill to exclude from gross income payments from the Hokie Spirit Memorial Fund to the victims of the tragic event, loss of life and limb, at Virginia Polytechnic Institute & State University.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14199)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
11/8/2007--Introduced.
Excludes from gross income, for federal tax purposes, any payments made by Virginia Polytechnic Institute & State University (Virginia Tech) out of the Hokie Spirit Memorial Fund to the victims of the tragic shootings at such school on April 16, 2007.
